sn17.7:1.3: diddhagatena visallena sallena → diṭṭhigatena visallena (bj); diṭṭhigatena sallena (sya-all, km); diṭṭhagatena visallena sallena (pts1ed, pts2ed); diṭṭhigatena visallena sallena (mr) | sekhaṁ → bijjhatu sekhaṁ (bj); sekkhaṁ (sya-all); taṁ sekhaṁ (pts1ed, pts2ed, mr) | anupāpuṇātu → anupāpuṇāti (pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
